Dm_RT_0032_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Last I saw him, he was with Gesane and
Laissa on a trip to find food.
Dm_RT_0032_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Understand_00>Ah, so you're looking for Princess Zelda.
Sorry to tell you that I haven't heard
anything about her.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_00>Our feathers are full dealing with a more
immediate problem.<sp:0:4:0>Everyone from the village has left to
scavenge for food or to investigate the
cause of this terrible blizzard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Angry_01>And all that has been hampered by the
<clr:0000>sky monsters<clr:ffff> that seem to be everywhere.<sp:0:4:0>We're spread too thin to deal with them
properly on top of everything else.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry, bud. Wish I could do more for you.<sp:5:1:0>
Dm_RT_0032_15: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Though now that I think of it...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>maybe Tulin could help.
Dm_RT_0032_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>His <clr:0000>wind-gust technique<clr:ffff> is something to
see. None of the rest of us can pull it off.<sp:0:4:0>Even stern Teba acknowledges that
Tulin's skill is a cut above.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>The kid does preen about it more than
he should, but... Well, it's worth asking
him, at least.
Dm_RT_0032_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>What is it? Did you still have some
business here?
Dm_RT_0032_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, right. You weren't around for it, but...<sp:0:4:0>Little Tulin has developed a way with
wings that puts the adults to shame.<sp:0:4:0>Even in this vicious weather, he patrols
the skies and reports all kinds of useful
information.
Dm_RT_0032_25:
I think they were on their way to
<clr:0000>Hebra South Summit Cave<clr:ffff>. That's to
the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> from here.<sp:0:4:0>The cave is <clr:0000>past the cliff out front <clr:ffff>and up
the mountain road. There should be a
<clr:0000>bonfire<clr:ffff> marking the spot.
Dm_RT_0032_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Link! You're all right!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I worried after I heard that you had gone
missing. What happened?
Dm_RT_0032_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Find the <clr:0000>bonfire at the mouth of the cave<clr:ffff>,
and you'll be on your way to finding Tulin.
